name: The Mechanized
startIntroPart1: *weep* My creators are gone. Succumbed to radiation poisoning. Claimed by the Cataclysm. *weep* But I remain. Entrusted with their last great task. To create a new society without the flaws of the old. A society run by machina. A society that can fix the damage caused by humans.
startIntroPart2: *meeep* So let my story begin. Let these lands flourish with new life. My life.
declaringWar: *weep* Intruders to our desired place! *weep* Die, inferiors! *weep*
attacked: The machines will crunch you. Your body will end in a feeding lab.
defeated: My life began in a lab and sadly it will end there. My people will decay not knowing I will remain. Fractured and Powerless. This is not the future I desired for my new life. I guess humanity was never inferior.
introduction: Hello, Humanborn. Do you possess interest in shaking hands with a living machina?
hateHello: *I am not going to answer inferior beings like you*
tradeRequest: The Artificial Intelligence has come up with this offer. It will surely be well thought.
